name: Non-Generic Metroidvania
description:
WASD to move

Space to jump

Hold Space when jumping to jump higher

K to attack

J to dash (when unlocked)

Space again in midair to double jump (when unlocked)

Space when touching a wall to wall jump (when unlocked)

Try and see if you can find all the heart upgrades! 

Thank you for playing!

Credits:

Keyboard sprites: https://hyohnoo.itch.io/keyboard-controller-keys

Music: https://joshuuu.itch.io/short-loopable-background-music

SFX: https://leohpaz.itch.io/minifantasy-dungeon-sfx-pack

Characters, Environments: https://o-lobster.itch.io/platformmetroidvania-pixel-art-asset-pack

Skull Boss: https://ansimuz.itch.io/gothicvania-patreon-collection
